Group_1.Message_5: No item is required to Teleport
Group_1.Message_4: You can't Teleport while Mounted or during Transformation!

Group_2.Message_6: [Warning]You can't Teleport while Mounted or during Transformation!
Group_2.Message_7: Press [Confirm] button to return to town.

Group_11.Message_1: The Battle of the ArchLord's takes place on the last weekend of each month.

Group_5.Message_1: Your level is not eligible to recieve a support gift.
Group_5.Message_2: Please cancel your transformation and try again.
Group_5.Message_3: Support gift items for the current level have already been given.
Group_5.Message_4: Your character is not eligible to recieve a support gift.
Group_5.Message_5: There is not enough space in your inventory.

Group_6.Message_1: Your Bag is full, item can't be claimed.
Group_6.Message_3: Exchange Failed! You do not have the required items.
Group_6.Message_4: Are you sure you want to exchange?

Group_7.Message_1: This action can't be performed during Transformation
Group_7.Message_4: Item's with a [Set Effect] can't be used in the [Epic Zone]. Please unequip them!
Group_7.Message_5: A Battle has already begun! Time remaining: %d m
Group_7.Message_6: Only the Party Leader can accept the Quest.

Menu_29.TITLE: ArchLord's Hall
Menu_29.Dialog: The Archlord Hall is a place where power gathers. As long as you master it, you will definitely become the Archlord. Join the forces of everyone to challenge the Archlord! The battle to decide the Archlord will be held on the weekend of the last week of every month.

Menu_112.TITLE: Teleport Manager
Menu_112.Dialog: Do you fear Death? Does the unknowing nature of Death not tremble your inner soul? If so I am ready to guide you to into the New World.\nOh but don't worry, it's surely a Death sentence for the likes of you!

Menu_113.TITLE: Throne of the Heavenly Abyss
Menu_113.Dialog: Exhausted, you notice a pair of bloodshot eyes gazing into your inner soul.\nThe reality dawns upon thyself that this battle will lead you no further than being returned to that of crumbled bones.

Button.TEXT: Entrance to the Throne of the Heavenly Abyss

Menu_1.TITLE: Chaos Portal
Menu_1.Dialog: Chaos Realm Portal. Select a moveable area in the Chaos Realm to use. Teleporting you would need a chaos teleportation passport .

Menu_2.TITLE: Portal list
Menu_2.Dialog: Chaos Realm Teleport List. Click the [Back] button to move to the nearest town.

Menu_36.TITLE: Festival of Xmas
Menu_36.Dialog: Merry Christmas. No matter how hard it is. Christmas is a good day. If you have Christmas bells. We have something good to exchange for you. Do you want it?

Menu_37.TITLE: Xmas Bells
Menu_37.Dialog:
Gather around! Come, come! Exchange your [Christmas Bell]'s!
Exchange 10 [Christmas Bell] for [Christmas Stocking]
Exchange 15 [Christmas Bell] for [Christmas Hat]
Exchange 20 [Christmas Bell] for [Christmas Gloves]

Menu_38.TITLE: Rudolph pet box
Menu_38.Dialog: Collect all three of the Xmas Ornaments and exchange them for a Rudolph Pet Box

Menu_39.TITLE: Xmas gift box
Menu_39.Dialog: Did you collect some Xmas bells? 50 Xmas bells can be exchanged for a Xmas gift box.
